tool_description: List of all Game of Thrones characters' names, families, images, and more.
title: Game of Thrones

api_list.name: Get continents
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://game-of-thrones1.p.rapidapi.com/Continents"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "game-of-thrones1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get character by ID
api_list.description: Returns a character by their ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://game-of-thrones1.p.rapidapi.com/Characters/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "game-of-thrones1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all characters
api_list.description: Returns all of the GOT characters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://game-of-thrones1.p.rapidapi.com/Characters"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "game-of-thrones1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
